name: Janet Pimple Out Acne Gel
description:
Removes Acne, Pimples & Skin Rashes. This real herb formula cools & soothes inflammations on the skin surface while working from the inside out to effectively dry and control pimples from the 1st use.*Images for illustration purpose only. Product received may vary.
How to use:
* Use on and around pimples and affected areas as soon as it is detected
* Continue till pimples are cleared
* For best results, use along with Pimples Out Peppermint Face Wash
